EmailTemplate.subject: Got JetWave on the Brain?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Dear Customers,
Contact StandardAero today to learn more about JetWave™, Honeywell’s in-flight connectivity solution for your aircraft.
When you do, you’ll be greeted by knowledgeable MRO professionals who are ready to walk you through everything you could ever want to know about this powerful, in-flight connectivity system.
Make the call to stay connected from anywhere around the world.
Contact StandardAero today.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/StandardAero_JetWave.html]]>
